mcq.statement: Select the sentence with the correct word order: I want that red small square new bag., I want that small square new red bag., I want that small new square red bag., I want that square small new red bag.

options.a: I want that red small square new bag.
options.b: I want that small square new red bag.
options.c: I want that small new square red bag.
options.d: I want that square small new red bag.
